title: 139: Purgatory, Yo
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Turns out, purgatory is great for fitness. In this episode, Thomas continues to guide us through Dante's Purgatorio, and we learn about Envy, Pride, Sloth, and Wrath.
itunes:author: The Wrathful; The Slothful; and A.J., who is perfect.
itunes:subtitle: We are climbing the mountain and avoiding the slides
itunes:summary: Turns out, purgatory is great for fitness. In this episode, Thomas continues to guide us through Dante's Purgatorio, and we learn about Envy, Pride, Sloth, and Wrath.
